    • Method Detail

      • readHost

        @Path(value="/{hostId}")
ApiHost readHost(String hostId,
                    DataView dataView)
        Returns a specific Host in the system.
        Parameters:
        hostId - The ID of the host to read.
        dataView - The view to materialize. Defaults to 'full'.
        Returns:
        The Host object with the specified hostId.
